amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the EPA from enforcing or implementing the Spill Prevention, Control, and Countermeasure (SPCC) rule on farming and ranching operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Crawford.
